mapper.select: SELECT b.boardno, b.title, b.writtendate, b.contents, b.views, b.userno, b.postno, p.performno, p.performname, p.performdate FROM board b, perform_add p WHERE b.boardno = p.boardno AND substr(p.performdate, 1, 6) = #{searchMonth } AND b.postno = 1 ORDER BY boardno DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT b.boardno, b.title, b.writtendate, b.contents, b.views, b.userno, b.postno, p.performno, p.performname, p.performdate FROM board b, perform_add p WHERE b.boardno = p.boardno ORDER BY boardno DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum ) BOARD WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM board ORDER BY boardno

SELECT b.boardno, b.title, b.writtendate, b.contents, b.views, b.userno, b.postno, p.performno, p.performname, p.performdate FROM board b, perform_add p WHERE b.boardno = p.boardno AND b.boardno = #{boardno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardno, title, writtendate, contents, views, userno, postno) VALUES (#{boardno}, #{title}, sysdate, #{contents}, 0, #{userno}, 1)
